name: Djuinostar High Performance Top
description: Djuinostar makes the best high performance tops. This small, silver, stainless steel top is machined for long spins. Try to set a record over five minutes and then challenge your friends and family!

name: Speevers Xballs Juggling Balls
description: Speevers creates high to professional quality juggling balls. This set of three, 4.2oz black and white balls is soft, well balanced, and durable. Learn to juggle or teach someone close to you!

name: Six Shot Nerf Gun
description: You'll shoot your eye out. I recommend buying extra darts for this six shot rotating barrel Nerf gun that can launch darts 27 meters. Annoy your roommates!

name: SGILE RC Stunt Car
description: Drive this indestructible SGILE stuntcar around inside or out. It flips, it spins, it breakdances, and it drives at up to 15km/hour!

name: Stomp Rocket Launcher
description: Stomp rockets up to 200 feet in the air using this air powered rocket launcher. You'll never find them! But luckily there are six.

name: Pandemic Board Game
description: Relive 2020...but fun? Think you could do better than the government? Prove it by playing the Pandemic board game.

name: Zooshine Metal Brain Puzzles
description: 18 metal brain teaser puzzles in a convenient box. Are you smart? This is the definitive test and nobody can take that away from you.

name: Fuck I'm Bored Book
description: Too good for the other gifts? Get this adult activity book with all kinds of different puzzles to do while you refuse to be social.

name: Yazhiji Temporary Tattoos
description: 60 pages of black and white temporary tattoos. There are birds, flowers, bugs, and many other designs. Confuse your grandmother!

name: Tibetan Singing Bowl
description: Rub this authentic tibetan singing bowl and instantly become relaxed. Comes with bowl, striker, and dampening pillow. Annoyed by your family or neighbors? Retreat into your own mind (or annoy them with this).

name: GDB Mini Arcade
description: This mini arcade cabinet comes with 200 classic arcade games like Foosbal Champ and Crazy Fighter. You won't recognize a single game, but boy are there a lot to try out! Put on your glasses because this screen has at least 25 pixels.

name: Googly Eyes
description: There are 1680 multi-colored googly eyes in this box, each with a peel off sticker for easy application. You'll never need googly eyes again. Put them on your appliances and pretend you still have a social life!

name: Donate $20
description: If you pick this option, I will donate $20 to a charity of my choice. Maybe it will go to abortion or the gays! Leave a message if you want me to consider your suggested charity.

name: OXO Full Silicone Spatula
description: OXO makes tons of our favorite kitchen products. The full silicone handle makes it heat resistant from top to bottom, so no more melted plastic!

name: Escali Lightweight Kitchen Scale
description: This scale comes in multiple colors to match your kitchen. If you are tired of washing measuring spoons, start using a kitchen scale instead! And if you struggle with counting calories, I guarantee that using this and myfitnesspal will help.

name: Digital Instant Read Meat Thermometer
description: Stop guessing in the kitchen! This thermometer is fast and accurate, with a magnet for quick access.

name: Knife Sharpener
description: Yes, this actually works. No, your sharpening rod doesn't work. You know your knives are dull, just pick this up and get to grinding!

name: The Food Lab Cookbook
description: Your new favorite recipes are in this cookbook. Each recipe comes with explanations and instructions on prep skills, ingredients, and improving your cooking.

name: Tea Kettle
description: Oi mate stop microwavin' your water, it's bad innit? Get some real tea and heat it oop in 60 seconds. Also good for quickly boiling water.

name: Nalgene Water Bottle
description: You're just so thirsty, buy this and guzzle some H20 and let it just drip all over you.

name: OXO POP Containers
description: Be careful getting these, they are addictive! Storage for your baking products, nuts, grains, candies, and everything else in your kitchen.

name: OXO Poultry Shears
description: Not just for poultry! These are very powerful, and very sharp. If you'd like to up your soup game with stock from scratch, or need bone pieces for any other reason (no murders please), these will work great.

name: 12-Piece Tupperware
description: These tupperware make me happy, they are so nice and clean. As simple as that.

name: OXO Scrub Brush
description: What are you sponsored by OXO or something? Seriously if you still use a sponge wtf is wrong with you.

name: Donate $25
description: If you pick this option, I will donate $25 to a charity of my choice, and it will be matched another $25 for a total of $50.

name: Pet Hair Remover Brush
description: Used by professional cleaners, this rubber brush quickly clears pet fur off of cloth, and is easily cleanable.

name: Things 3
description: The end all be all of fixing your life. The Windex of apps.

name: Structured
description: Time-of-day based task manager. Great for building routines and setting time based reminders.

name: Tody
description: Score points against germs with relaxed cleaning todos, suggested room by room at your own pace.

name: Taskheat
description: Flowchart based project todos. Break larger goals into dependency based charts.

name: Obsidian
description: Markdown files in a linked network. The best free zettelkasten tool.

name: Mela
description: Automatically import recipes using a URL, create meal plans, and then generate your grocery list.

name: Paprika Recipe Manager 3
description: Popular alternative to Mela for managing recipes, with slight feature differences

name: Goblin Tools
description: A smart UI and filters on top of ChatGPT to help you be more productive.

name: Countdown
description: Birthday? Vacation? Taylor Swift Tickets? Keep track of important events coming up that you are looking forward to.

name: Clay
description: Your social life, managed as a CRM. Don't remember Josh's wife's name? Don't know who to reach out to when you visit NYC? Track it all with powerful integrations and reminders.

name: Draft Paper
description: Create a scale drawing of your room. Why? Shut up.

name: Planny
description: The simplest of todo apps, with excellent features. Track your productivity over time. Yes, I have too many todo apps.

name: Fitbod
description: Personalized workout suggestions based on available equipment, muscle tiredness, and personal history. Store your workouts and repeat them.

name: ForScore
description: Write all over your digitized sheet music and then hide it to pretend you are a real musician.

name: Stylebook
description: New clothes aren't going to make you look less fat Jan. Styling though...

name: Tiny Decisions
description: Decision too hard for your little baby brain? Make phone do it

name: Redue
description: Build and repeat routines, like a packing list or your morning routine.

name: Skratch
description: A digital skratch off map of where you have been

name: Streaks
description: Great for tracking individual habits you want to build. Jesus christ fix your posture.

name: Fog of World
description: Sacrifice your privacy to record everywhere you go in exchange for points and achievements.

name: Daylio
description: Record your mood and journal, with absolutely unlimited customization. You are so special

name: Aphrodite
description: Yes, you can even track that.

name: ChatGPT
description: An AI expert* on every topic at your fingers. * - may actually say something dumb as hell.

name: Pythonista
description: Write and run Python on your phone.

name: Planter
description: Farmville but for real life.

name: Forest
description: Use your phone to stop looking at your phone. Can we call it a dystopia yet?

name: Hauora Health Widgets
description: In 18 months of looking this is the best health widget app I could find that wasn't a subscription. WTF

name: Donate $25
description: Try out these free and/or very expensive apps! Nerdwallet, Freeform, Gardenia, Farm Your Yard, Family Tree, Beli, Figma, Paku, RocketMoney, Flighty, Cronometer, Strava, Sleep Cycle, All Trails, Tripsy, 1Password, Gyroscope, Headspace, and Exist

name: Tricky Towers
description: Competitive Tetris minigames, with physics for a little extra chaos. Play with your friends online, by steam remote play, or locally.

name: Ultimate Chicken Horse
description: Build a platformer course one round at a time, then race to the finish. Play with your friends online, by steam remote play, or locally.

name: Golf With Your Friends
description: Dozens of official and community made mini-golf courses. Play with your friends online, by steam remote play, or locally.

name: The Jackbox Party Pack
description: Surely everyone has tried this by now? One person hosts on a computer, the rest connect on their phone. Built for parties.

name: Overcooked 2
description: Run an understaffed cartoon restaurant with someone you enjoy shouting at. Play with your friends online, by steam remote play, or locally.

name: Heave Ho
description: Climb, fling, and roll your way through short levels...or squash your friends. Play with your friends by steam remote play or locally.

name: Towerfall Ascension
description: PvP platform bow-shooting with a super high skill ceiling. Play with your friends by steam remote play or locally.

name: Broforce
description: Excessive force? More like excessive freedom. Classic run and gun with your bro. Play with your friends by steam remote play or locally.

name: Celeste
description: Best quality of life platformer of all time. Single player.

name: Untitled Goose Game
description: Terrorize the residents of a small village as a goose. Single player or local co-op.

name: Slider
description: What if sliding tile puzzles were fun? An ingenious and quirky answer. Single player.

name: Pilgrims
description: Help solve problems for the strange characters in this half hour story. Single player.

name: Please Touch The Artwork
description: Creative puzzler creating modern art. Play the Style Gallery. Single player.

name: Poly Bridge
description: Put your engineering to the test by optimizing 2D bridges. Single player.

name: Vampire Survivors
description: Survive the night horde in this themed bullet hell with addicting mechanics. Single player or steam remote play.

name: Creeper World
description: RTS but fight against water. Single player.

name: Shapez 2
description: A factory game in its simplest possible form. Single player.

name: Unexplored
description: If nothing on this list has interested you, then we have different taste in games. Try out these highly rated possibilities: Peglin, Chillquarium, Loop Hero, Return of the Obra Dinn, Slay the Spire, Hollow Knight, Unpacking, Potion Permit, Rocket League, or Stardew Valley.

name: Donate $25
description: Steam has many free games too! Like Slider!
